SELECT COUNT(USER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_USER
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_USER
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(SITTER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SITTER WHERE SITTER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(APPLY_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SITTER_APPLY WHERE APPLY_STATUS = '승인 대기'

SELECT COUNT(STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER) FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_STROLL_BOARD B ON U.USER_NUMBER = B.USER_NUMBER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR STROLL_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(APPLY_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SITTER_APPLY WHERE APPLY_STATUS = '승인 대기'

SELECT A.APPLY_NUMBER, U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_PHONE_NUMBER, U.USER_ADDRESS, A.APPLY_CONTENT FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_SITTER_APPLY A ON U.USER_NUMBER = A.USER_NUMBER AND A.APPLY_NUMBER = #{applyNumber}
SELECT APPLY_FILE_NUMBER, APPLY_FILE_TITLE, APPLY_FILE_NAME, APPLY_FILE_UUID, APPLY_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, APPLY_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER FROM TBL_SITTER_APPLY_LICENSE_FILE WHERE APPLY_NUMBER = #{applyNumber}
SELECT F.SITTER_FIELD_NUMBER, F.PET_FIELD_NAME, F.USER_NUMBER, A.APPLY_NUMBER FROM TBL_SITTER_FIELD F JOIN TBL_SITTER_APPLY A ON F.USER_NUMBER = A.USER_NUMBER WHERE APPLY_NUMBER = #{applyNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SITTER (SITTER_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, SITTER_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_SITTER.NEXTVAL, #{userNumber}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(SITTER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SITTER
SELECT COUNT(SITTER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_SITTER S ON U.USER_NUMBER =S.USER_NUMBER AND S.SITTER_STATUS ='Y' AND U.USER_STATUS = 2 WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT U.USER_NUMBER, S.SITTER_NUMBER, U.USER_ID, US.STATUS_NAME , NVL( (SELECT LISTAGG(PET_FIELD_NAME , ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SITTER_FIELD_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SITTER_FIELD SF WHERE USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER) ,'없음' ) AS PET_FIELD_NAME,U.USER_NAME ,U.USER_GENDER,U.USER_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(U.USER_BIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USER_BIRTH , U.USER_PHONE_NUMBER ,COUNT(REVIEW_NUMBER) AS REVIEW_COUNT, NVL(AVG(REVIEW_SCORE), 0) AS REVIEW_AVG, U.USER_ADDRESS,U.USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL , NVL((SELECT LISTAGG(APPLY_FILE_TITLE , ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY APPLY_FILE_TITLE ) FROM TBL_SITTER_APPLY_LICENSE_FILE WHERE USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER),'없음') AS APPLY_FILE_TITLE
FROM TBL_USER_STATUS US JOIN TBL_USER U ON US.STATUS_NUMBER = U.USER_STATUS JOIN TBL_SITTER S ON U.USER_NUMBER =S.USER_NUMBER AND S.SITTER_NUMBER = #{sitterNumber} LEFT JOIN TBL_SITTER_REVIEW SR ON S.SITTER_NUMBER = SR.SITTER_NUMBER GROUP BY S.SITTER_NUMBER, U.USER_ID, U.USER_PHONE_NUMBER, U.USER_NUMBER,US.STATUS_NAME, U.USER_NAME,U.USER_GENDER,U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_BIRTH,U.USER_ADDRESS,U.USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL
